components.title: Leo

description: The Leo astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Lion.
title: Leo

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: The Leo astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Lion. Leo was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 and added to  http://emojipedia.org/leo/
emoji_net_data.name: Leo

bn:01715262n: Leo is the fifth astrological sign of the zodiac, originating from the constellation of Leo.
Someone with a Leo star sign
Someone with a Leo star sign.

bn:00050692n: A section of the night sky
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
A zodiacal constellation in northern hemisphere between Cancer and Virgo
Leo is one of the constellations of the zodiac, lying between Cancer to the west and Virgo to the east.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Leo emoji is a majestic depiction of the lion, rendered with a rich, golden-brown mane that radiates strength and pride. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give the lion a powerful, almost regal presence. This emoji, with its soft rounded edges and dynamic posture, symbolizes courage, leadership, and the zodiac sign of Leo, often used to convey confidence or a bold spirit.
